#### The published [paper](https://conbio.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/conl.12298) is available on-line.

This paper explores how the evenness of habitat representation within protected areas has changed through time.

This work was presented at a University of Queensland Landscape Ecology and Conservation seminar in 2016.
